name: silent-feynman
description: A high-end, high-performance executive landing page and project portal. Designed for maximum information density and premium visual impact, optimized for strategic consulting and global impact storytelling.

scripts.minify:css: postcss css/styles.css -o css/styles.min.css --use cssnano && postcss css/projects.css -o css/projects.min.css --use cssnano && postcss css/mobile-overrides.css -o css/mobile-overrides.min.css --use cssnano && postcss css/mobile-modal.css -o css/mobile-modal.min.css --use cssnano
scripts.minify:js: terser js/main.js -o js/main.min.js -c -m && terser js/projects.js -o js/projects.min.js -c -m && terser js/documents-data.js -o js/documents-data.min.js -c -m
scripts.build: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
